channel.title: Running and Compiling
channel.description:
Well, I recently got a virus in my computer, and wiped me out. My friend helped me fix it up so it will work at all again. I quit java coding for a while, now I'm planning on coming back with a huge V3 come back server. When I was wiped out, servers, client and compiling did not work. I fixed clients, now I need assistant's with running the server and compiling servers and clients.
Here is my error for running the server
[img]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt311/chaospkers/ca1.jpg[/img]
And for the compiling, no matter what JDK I use, even if I do have it, variables set and all, it will say it can't find the path specified. So if there's a compiler somebody has for servers and clients that doesn't use JDK, if you can give me that please, thanks guys!
*NOTE - Yes I do have java.

@Weed92 wrote:

Well i have to go any questions message me on igettoi@hotmail.com, ill try to get back too you too see if it worked.

item.title: Running and Compiling
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

This is for the server, the major one.

@echo off
Title Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe” *.java
pause

I also tried dragging and dropping the java into the folder.

Read full topic

item.title: Running and Compiling
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

My god you guys, read my post. I said in it “No matter what JDK I use, even if I do have it, or it is set in variables, it still won’t work.”

Client:

@echo off javac *.java pause

Server:

@echo off COLOR 09 cls :menu title Runserver + Compiler version 1.2 echo Please choose an option below to do that function. echo Keep posted on the Moparscape Tutorials section for echo any updates that I post. echo. echo c - Compile your server. echo r - To run your server. echo e - To exit out of the program. echo. echo. set /p compile=Option: if %compile%==c goto compile if %compile%==C goto compile if %compile%==r goto run if %compile%==R goto run if %compile%==e goto end if %compile%==E goto end if %compile#==* goto error goto error :compile cls title Compiler if defined javac (goto compile2) else (goto checkjavac) :compile2 if exist *.java (goto compile3) else (goto compileerror) :compile3 %javac% -cp . *.java pause cls goto menu :compileerror cls echo You need to have Java files for this compiler to compile. pause cls goto menu :run cls title Runserver if exist .\server.class (goto run2) else (goto servererror) :run2 set java=java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar cls goto run3 :run3 %java% server pause cls goto menu :servererror cls title Error echo You do not have a Server.class. Make sure that you have used the echo compiler with your server BEFORE you try running it. pause cls goto menu :error cls title Error echo Invalid command. Please make sure the commands you type echo in are correct. pause cls goto menu :end cls exit :checkjavac if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac) else (goto checkjavac2) :checkjavac2 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac2) else (goto checkjavac3) :checkjavac3 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac3) else (goto checkjavac4) :checkjavac4 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac4) else (goto checkjavac5) :checkjavac5 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac5) else (goto checkjavac6) :checkjavac6 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac6) else (goto checkjavac7) :checkjavac7 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac7) else (goto checkjavac8) :checkjavac8 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac8) else (goto checkjavac9) :checkjavac9 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac9) else (goto checkjavac10) :checkjavac10 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac10) else (goto checkjavac11) :checkjavac11 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac11) else (goto checkjavac12) :checkjavac12 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac12) else (goto javacerror) :setjavac set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac2 set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac3 set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac4 set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac5 set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac6 set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac7 set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac8 set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac9 set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac10 set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac11 set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac12 set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0_14\bin\javac.exe" goto compile2 :javacerror cls title Error echo You do not have JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0. Go to Mod Taharok's tutorial echo on the Moparscape Tuturoials section for a direct link to download echo the newest JDK Update. pause cls goto menu

Read full topic

item.title: Running and Compiling
item.dc:creator: @Weed92 Weed92
item.description:
@Weed92 wrote:

ChaosPkers:

Guys I have jdk, it’s cause my java is messed up because of the virus. And weed, just tell me on here, msn is gay and it’s a waste of my time.

You need to find your JDK code, go to My comp, C, Program files, Java look what version JDK you have, and then go to your compiler, Press Edit, then look what version java is there, say you have jdk 13 and it says “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin\javac.exe” Change the _12 to a 13 and save compile, it should be fixed.

Read full topic
